problem.title: Problem Solved
problem.paragraph1: Facebook, we have a bone to pick with you! Nowadays, if you are a house-sitter or a pet-parent, the experience of finding what you're looking for is pretty gruesome.
problem.paragraph2: Services other than Housitters.com are currently either:

list.item1: Free but inconvenient: Facebook, allowing no search filters, displaying posts in non-chronological order.
list.item2: Convenient but costly: similar house-sitting websites charge around 200 USD for a yearly subscription.

problem.paragraph3: Housitters.com is the first house-sitting marketplace which is both free and user-friendly.
problem.blockquote: We can finally stop chasing our own tail :)

motivation.description1: I've been a house-sitter since April 2021. For a year, I wrote
motivation.description2: a monthly personal blog about it in 'Haaretz',
motivation.description3: one of Israel's prominent newspapers: Personally, my experience has been smooth, likely due to the exposure from my blog. I've received more house-sitting invitations than I could accept. However, as I was getting to know the house-sitting community, I recognized a common frustration with existing services. This presented a unique opportunity for me to both develop my coding skills and address a genuine problem in my community.
motivation.punch2: hitting two birds with one stone
motivation.punch3: racing two dogs with one ball.

usage.signUpInfo1: To explore pets, houses, and house-sitters, you first need to sign up. Upon signing up, define yourself as either a
usage.signUpInfo5: The interface varies according to the user type.
usage.createProfile: Create and edit a profile and a public post, respective to your user type.
usage.contact: Contact (or get contacted by) other registered members.
usage.filter: Filter searches for either houses or sitters:
usage.byDate: By date (single range / multiple ranges / Anytime).
usage.byLocation: By location (house-sitters can search multiple locations, landlords are limited to one).
usage.post: These filters are separate from the dates and locations specified in your profile or public post, by which other users can find you in their search results.
usage.sort: Sort the results according to relevant criteria.
usage.reviews: Reviews: post and read reviews on other users, to make sure everybody's heading for a good experience.
usage.getInTouch: Get in touch with us for feedback or suggestions.
usage.manage: Efficiently manage prior chats using a personal inbox.

futurePlans.modify: Modify the location options to allow international users.
